result.markup: There was an unfavorable decrease of -61.4k subscribers (-0.2%) over 2023 year to date.
result.question: How has Total Subscribers changed?

result.markup: Total Subscribers in September 2024 was 28.5M subscribers and was within the expected range of 27.5M subscribers to 30.5M subscribers, considering seasonal patterns.
